title: Tamika Mallory Interview, Akon, Junior Sports, Best Sex Week and more.
itunes:title: Tamika Mallory Interview, Akon, Junior Sports, Best Sex Week and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! "Let's get it on, ow baby." The Chief Love Officer must get to the bottom of brutal honesty. Activist Tamika Mallory stopped by to talk about her new book 'State of Emergency' with the crew. Your favorite play cousin is happy to report that the sports world is committing themselves to ending social injustice. The fellas are asked a carnal question. ATL police are looking for the person or persons involved in stealing the Akon's Range Rover in Buckhead. Today the crew wrap up the show by giving us a friendly reminder about the upcoming iHeart Radio Awards and it leads to a conversation about Stevie Wonder.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
